heading: HR00874
0:
RESOLUTION URGING THE SECRETARY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR
AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT, AS THE VICE CHAIRMAN FOR PREPAREDNESS OF THE NATIONAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT COUNCIL, TO DIRECT ALL LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS TO PREPARE THEIR EVACUATION CENTERS CONSISTENT WITH THE PERTINENT DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH COVID-19 GUIDELINES
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-05-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00874
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE SECRETARY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT, AS THE VICE CHAIRMAN FOR PREPAREDNESS OF THE NATIONAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT COUNCIL, TO DIRECT ALL LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS TO PREPARE THEIR EVACUATION CENTERS CONSISTENT WITH THE PERTINENT DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH COVID-19 GUIDELINES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SALO, RON P.
